application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Right Boundary) T1: Oak Tree - Prune in extended leader by 1m - 1.5m and remove major dead wood height 7m & spread 5.5m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 4.5mT2: Seycamore tree - Reduce by 2 - 3 metres, to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, remove epicormic growth and major dead wood height 12m & spread 6m. Reduce height to 10m & spread to 5mT5: Small Sycamore tree - Reduce  by 2 metres, to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, remove epicormic growth and major dead wood height 9m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 8m & spread to 4.5mLeft Boundary T6: Cherry Tree - Reduce by 1.5 - 2.5  metres, to balance canopy and maintain an even shape, remove epicormic growth and major dead wood height 7m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 3.5mReason for work clearance from buildingGeneral tree maintenance More light Reduce shading to house
